website_summaries.verdict: Sharp, heavy-duty scissors for cutting carpet and upholstery.
pros: User can adjust pivots for easier use
Suitable for thicker materials like carpet
cons: Scissors may grow dull and require sharpening

customer_reviews.title: great quality fair price
customer_reviews.text: I work for a large furniture company as a fabric cutter and make my living with a pair of scissors.Wiss has always been my first choice,they are high quality and hold an edge for several weeks before needing sharpening. I expect at least three years out of a pair of scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Craig E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Pair of Heavy Shears
customer_reviews.text: I was installing large 8ftX112ft. nylon over straw erosion blankets on embankments and the shop scissors were not cutting it - literally. I needed large, sharp heavy shears and these seemed to fit the bill. Thy are large, and heavy, but they cut beautifully. There shears would cut just about any fabric, maybe even light carpet. They are one of those tools you never get rid of and keep in a family forever.
customer_reviews.author: M. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. The edges were a little rough upon ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. The edges were a little rough upon delivery but came up to standard with a small amount of work on my stones. They were adjusted a bit too tight out of the box, but take an adjustment easily and hold it well. I have extra large hands and can very comfortably fit three fingers in the lower handle. Four fingers will fit but that is a little cramped. The thumb hole is very generous. They are very large. Wiss makes good products so I am confident they will hold an edge well, and last a long time with reasonable care.
customer_reviews.author: Falling Up

customer_reviews.title: Nice scissors.
customer_reviews.text: The length of these scissors allow you to cut on a straighter plane (line) than smaller bladed scissors. They are comfortable to use and are very heavy duty. I use these to cut carpeting. I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rob

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable to use. Maybe if I had super-hero hands, I could use this more easily. Looks like it will last, but it is really heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Product as described  Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Great Scissors,but my hands are old and weak! They are very large and heavy, but that is the purpose of upholstery scissors. They cut all kinds of heavy fabric with no problems. Just wish i had ordered a smaller pair! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best scissors I've ever used! This are some top of the line quality scissors. They're very sharp and built to last forever. They're also big, you could use them to film a movie and they'd be a perfect weapon. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Sir Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors.
customer_reviews.text: These scissors were purchased for cutting fiberglass cloth and work very well for this task. I’m sure they would work well for other uses.... they’re very sharp and cut the entire length of the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: work well
customer_reviews.text: This was a requested gift for my son for his shop and he was very happy with it. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and cut well.
customer_reviews.text: Not "mirror polished" like older shears, but fully functional and cut well out of the box. I have large hands and these fit fine, had to get rid of another pair that were just too small for me.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, heavy duty as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I got these as general purpose cutters in my shop. I cut rubber hose, thin metal, carpet and much more. My other pair has been in use for approximately 15 years in another area. I am totally satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot for the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm from the "if a little will do good a lot will do better" school of thought. I bought these to use as desk scissors in my home office. They're huge! But, I certainly have no problems cutting paper and opening packages (or cutting mooring line if I needed to). So, since these are excellent quality I recommend them. However, unless you are planning to actually cut mooring line you might want to purchase one of the smaller sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Basil T Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Great Scissors
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are great...They cut carpet and that is what I needed them for...Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Memaw 43

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for strong hands
customer_reviews.text: Very good, stout right-hand scissors. Will not flex on on thick material. Very heavy. Requires significant hand strength to operate. Would definitely recommend for cutting heavy material.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Much too heavy for occasional carpet pad trimming
customer_reviews.author: bogiesmom

customer_reviews.title: Weight & size
customer_reviews.text: To heavy & to big . I ordered the size of my old pair but these were much bigger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Best scissors for HVAC work. From cutting insulation to flex duct runs, these scissors are a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't imagine you could need a bigger or better pair of scissors.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pair of scissors. Huge, little hard to handle, but very capable for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: victor gomez

customer_reviews.title: Handles fit large hands.
customer_reviews.text: I use them to cut out nylon pack clothes fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Coons

customer_reviews.title: You will only need one of these
customer_reviews.text: Built like a tank. Very heavy duty. Kind of like buying quality tools, you only buy one and enjoy using it the rest of your life..
customer_reviews.author: S wag

customer_reviews.title: Loved them.
customer_reviews.text: great quality. I needed to replace one that disappeared. I was able to cut insulation that needed to be removed. quick & easy With your super scissors. Thank you for a great product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret W.

customer_reviews.title: You take your chances with these
customer_reviews.text: Hit & miss on these sissies... One pair cut great, one pair dull from the start
customer_reviews.author: rlmorris

customer_reviews.title: great scissors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these scissors because I was going replace the carpet in my old van and knew I didn't have anything to cut the half inch insulation and carpet. I was not disappointed! These scissors are big, sharp, sturdy built, with nice big handles that are comfortable while cutting thick material. It says in the description that they are made in the US. They are not. They are made in Columbia but they are still a very good pair of scissors. I now use them for everything I need scissors for. They stay in my toolbox
customer_reviews.author: spoin

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are strong and easily cut through carpet. Price was right for the product.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome for thick material
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for thick material, even leather. And the cut is like twice as long from a longer blade. Without these, your fabric scissors would be ruined. These are adjustable for when you tried to use them on too of thick material, and the blade is thick enough to withstand many sharpening a.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great for fiberglass & carbon fiber
customer_reviews.text: I use these in our composites shop at work to cut 10oz & 20oz fiberglass mats & carbon finer, and they work great out of the box. They are a bit on the heavy side, but not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Zakalowski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scissors to cut thick
customer_reviews.text: Perfect scissors to cut thick, thin fabrics. Be wary, the scissors are indeed 12 1/4 inches. They're huge. I've been using them for a while now and they're still sharp like they were brand new. I use them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Well made product!
customer_reviews.text: Great sheers used to cut insulation. They are heavy duty and will cut almost anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Great shears
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sharp, best I have used for cutting carbon fiber cloth and other expensive materials.
customer_reviews.author: William Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sorry sent back quality was good but the size to much for me. Orered a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bley

customer_reviews.title: If you need a BIG pair if scissors this is the one to get
customer_reviews.text: Great scissors... Especially for the price. Quality seems good. They come very sharp. I have used them to cut canvas.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made heavy duty. Worth the money for sure
customer_reviews.author: bsample

customer_reviews.title: Little hard to use for cutting carpet
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought these to cut some carpet into rugs. They got the job done but took a good bit of strength to use them. I ended up using a sharp knife.
customer_reviews.author: Twigs

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an upholstery class rather than pay the instructor $60 for a pair. While I didn't pay attention to the fact that they are 12+" long, I have to say these cut very well, are very sturdy and are the talk of class not only for the value at $33, their size (I feel safe walking to my car with these in hand) and their cutting ability.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Good for thick fabric
customer_reviews.text: I use these to cut rug pads and they work great. Terrifyingly large though.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty scissor that really is that
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid product that does what light weight scissors simply cannot do. These are husky enough for all kinds of jobs I've used them on.
customer_reviews.author: westcoaz

customer_reviews.title: Mondo scissors
customer_reviews.text: Huge, well made, cuts carpet, cardboard, layers of cloth. A great tool to have handy. Cuts things you would otherwise need a razor knife for.
customer_reviews.author: David Dee

customer_reviews.title: What industrial scissors should be!
customer_reviews.text: I love these scissors. They are a little heavy, but I have very large hands and most feel like toys. These cut great and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Pongetti

customer_reviews.title: Carpet scissors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut carpet that I install in my house. They are heavy duty and should do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a well made heavy duty item. But i had to return it because i didn't realize how big it was.
customer_reviews.author: IEK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OMYGOD they are bigger then I thought. Kick ass cut on Carbon and Kevilar
customer_reviews.author: James E. Traynor

customer_reviews.title: No Substitute for Quality
customer_reviews.text: There is no substitute for this shears. I have a couple- one at home and one at work because once you use them, nothing else will do.
customer_reviews.author: EastPalmBeach

customer_reviews.title: Don't Believe the Hype
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cut some ordinary household carpeting that was slightly too thick for an old ordinary pair of household scissors. These shears did the job, but barely and only with significant effort resulting in a sore cutting hand. The reviews would lead one to think these could cut through carpet like a knife through warm butter. They don't. Probably a new quality pair of regular scissors would have done the job for $25 less.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work great for heavier duty use. A man can fit his fingers in the grips.
customer_reviews.author: E. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Had Hoped For!
customer_reviews.text: My husband put these on his Christmas List. He was very happily surprised that I was able to get the exact pair he desired. He gets much use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: JulieB

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Good and strong, well-crafted. May be a little pricey, but nonetheless they work well and they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Mike of NY

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the product as it was as expected of quality shears. The delivery was very fast and the shears cut fabric very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gazza

customer_reviews.title: wiss.
customer_reviews.text: great quality. I received just what i needed. Although the price could be better. I would recommend to others. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Nothings perfect. I wear one or two work gloves on ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy yet strong scissors bought for cutting carpet. Takes a lot of effort though. Nothings perfect. I wear one or two work gloves on same hand to make it more comfortable. Heavy duty. Hard on hand. But what else cuts carpet? Saw, blade, etc. I can use this for other purposes in future.
customer_reviews.author: consumerReviewer#658567

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My mom lost her scissors and I wanted to replace them . They are exactly like the ones she lost and she's very Happy. If I would need additional items from this vendor I would definitely buy.. Wiss is a very well known brand in the Garment Industry.
customer_reviews.author: LilyAnn

customer_reviews.title: These are for very large hands
customer_reviews.text: Way too large for my hand, and I do not have a tiny hand.
customer_reviews.author: oneluckywoman

product_meta.title: Crescent Wiss 12" Wide Blade Bent Handle Industrial Shears - W22W
product_meta.description: Red Cushion Grip handles found on 20WP and 22WP provide maximum comfort. Finest quality cutlery steel. Thicker, heavy blades cut through multiple layers and tough material. Hot dropforged polished blades. Patented SETEASY pivot.
feature_bullets: Thick, Heavy Duty Blades For Cutting Multiple Layers And Tough Materials
Ideal For Cutting Upholstery, Carpet, And Drapery
Precision Ground Blades For Sharper Cutting Edges And Longer Blade Life
Handle Rings Designed To Comfortably Fit Users Hands
Set-Easy Pivot Adjustment Easily And Securely Adjust To Users Preference

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars167 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
